example.eg: Don't interrupt me when I'm talking, please.
example.egtrans: 在我说话时请不要打断我。

dsense.name: don't!
dsense.guideword: colloquial, abbreviation (do not do that) (感叹词)

example.eg: If you're thinking of telling Dad what I did, then don't!
example.egtrans: 如果你打算告诉爸爸我做的事，请打消这个念头，不要那样做！

dsense.name: damned if you do, damned if you do and damned if you don't
don't bother
dsense.guideword: (do not go to the trouble of doing [sth])

trans_examp.trans_cn: 别麻烦了, 不打扰了

example.eg: Don't forget to turn off the light when leaving the office.

dsense.name: don't judge a book by the cover, don't judge a book by its cover

example.eg: She definitely looks trustworthy, but don't judge a book by its cover.
"Thanks so much for all your help." "Don't mention it! It was no trouble."
example.egtrans: “十分感谢你的帮助。”“不客气！不是什么事儿。”

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不客气, 不用谢, 别找麻烦了

example.eg: In case of fire, walk, don't run, to the nearest exit.
Why am I asking you for directions? - well, you live here, don't you?
There is no point asking me; I do not know.  I do not know the answer to that complicated math problem!
"You can't go out dressed like that; you'll get cold." "I don't care."
example.egtrans: “你不能穿那个出门，会感冒的。”“我不在乎。”

example.eg: "Who's that woman talking to your brother?" "I don't know."
example.egtrans: “那个跟你哥哥聊天的女人是谁？”“我不知道。”

dsense.name: I don't mind
dsense.guideword: informal (I have no preference) (非正式用语)

example.eg: "We can go to the cinema or ten-pin bowling. What do you want to do?" "I don't mind."
example.egtrans: “我们可以去看电影也可以去打保龄球。你想做什么？”“我无所谓。”

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我无所谓，怎么都可以，随便

dsense.name: I don't mind
dsense.guideword: informal (I am not upset) (非正式用语)

example.eg: I don't mind if you sit beside me.
When Tom asked me if Sally was coming to the party I replied "I don't think so".

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我认为并非如此, 我不同意

dsense.name: two wrongs don't make a right

example.eg: Just because Heather was cruel to you, doesn't mean you should be cruel to her—two wrongs don't make a right.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以牙还牙于事无补, 不能因为别人犯错就代表自己也可以犯错
我会让你知道我是对的, 你等着瞧
